description: A podcast host uses PodMatch AI to find a bestselling author whose style matches past literary episodes and receives a ready‑to‑send outreach email.

messages.content: You are PodMatch AI, an agentic assistant that helps podcast creators find and pitch ideal guests by analyzing podcast metadata, audience interests, and expert profiles.

I host a literary podcast called "Pages & Voices". I want to feature a new bestseller author whose style fits the themes of our recent episodes. Can you find a good match and draft an outreach email for me?
Sure! First I’ll gather the episode data from your RSS feed so I can understand the topics you’ve covered.
Great, I have the episode topics. Next I’ll look at your audience analytics to see what listeners care about most.
Using the episode topics and audience interests, I’ve built a keyword list to search for matching experts.
Now I’ll rank these candidates against your past episode topics and audience interests.

candidates.name: Lydia Harper
candidates.bio: Lydia Harper's debut novel 'Echoes of Dawn' became a New York Times bestseller, praised for its vivid character arcs and modern themes.

candidates.name: Samuel Ruiz
candidates.bio: Samuel Ruiz authored 'The Last Horizon', a critically acclaimed contemporary fiction work exploring urban alienation.

candidates.name: Aisha Khan
candidates.bio: Aisha Khan represents several bestselling authors in the contemporary fiction genre, known for strategic marketing campaigns.

messages.content: Lydia Harper looks like the strongest fit (92% suitability). I’ll craft a personalized pitch for her upcoming episode titled "Crafting Characters that Resonate".

arguments.guest_bio: Lydia Harper's debut novel 'Echoes of Dawn' became a New York Times bestseller, praised for its vivid character arcs and modern themes.

messages.content:
Subject: Invitation to Join "Pages & Voices" – Episode on Crafting Characters

Hi Lydia,

I’m Mia Torres, host of the literary podcast "Pages & Voices." I’ve been following your work since the release of *Echoes of Dawn* and was struck by the way you bring characters to life with such depth and nuance.

Our upcoming episode, "Crafting Characters that Resonate," explores the art and technique behind memorable protagonists – a topic that aligns perfectly with your expertise and the themes you champion in your writing.

We would love to have you on the show to discuss:
• Your process for developing multi‑dimensional characters
• How you balance plot and character‑driven storytelling
• Advice for emerging authors looking to create characters that stick with readers

The episode typically runs 45‑60 minutes and is recorded remotely at a time that fits your schedule. Our audience, which is heavily interested in contemporary fiction and author interviews, would be thrilled to hear your insights.

Would you be available for a conversation in the next two weeks? Please let me know a few dates/times that work for you, and I’ll make the arrangements.

Looking forward to the possibility of featuring you on "Pages & Voices."

Warm regards,
Mia Torres
Host, Pages & Voices
mia@pagesandvoices.com
Here’s the ready‑to‑send email pitch for Lydia Harper. Let me know if you’d like any tweaks or if you’d prefer to move forward with scheduling.
